title: HOW TO FIND RUNE PAGES / RUNE BUNDLE IN THE  6.21 PATCH ^____^ ! ! !
body:
Hey fam,

If you are a player looking for the "missing rune pages", I recommend that you refer to the above  picture ^___^ ! Or you can use this [**this link**](http://imgur.com/a/KVeFd)! For those who can't see the picture, then use the following steps!  

-> Open Store
-> Go to "GamePlay"
-> On the left hand side, toggle "Show All" in the Tier/Types/Effects Field. 
-> Should show up.

All the best {{champion:55}}  !
